description:
Crypto is here to stay and stablecoins are the killer use case. They're now a real thread to the legacy payment networks and growth will only accelerate with a better regulatory environment coming.

We'd love to fund builders working on stablecoin ideas.

Apply to YC Winter 2025 at https://ycombinator.com/apply.
title: Stablecoins 2.0

description:
We all deserve to be safe on our own streets.

Did you know that YC-backed Flock Safety’s license plate readers are solving 10% of reported crime across the USA? Their goal is 25% by end of next year.

At YC, we would love more tech that brings public safety to everyone.

Apply to YC Winter 2025 at https://ycombinator.com/apply.
title: Public Safety Technology

description:
AI is great at automating repetitive administrative work and the government needs to reduce spending. 

Combine those two ideas and now could be a great time to build software to make the government run more efficiently.

YC would love to fund any builders up for the challenge.

Apply to YC Winter 2025 at https://ycombinator.com/apply.
title: Government Software
